name: A Warm Cup
description:
A short choose-your-own adventure text game with over 28,000 words and nine endings to be discovered!

Discover the story of Duala, an expert on ancient magical items who has been kidnapped by a dragon with a refined palatte for items of power. Decide their fate as they make their way to the lost tomb of Nalia, the Witch-King, and discover what horrors lie within her pyramid - and the phantom who has been waiting a long, long time to be free.
